Dubay - Birlashgan Arab Amirliklaridagi: Dubai is a city and emirate in the United Arab Emirates, famous for luxury shopping, ultramodern architecture, and a lively nightlife scene. The Burj Khalifa tower, standing at 830 meters, dominates the skyline filled with skyscrapers. At its base, the Dubai Fountain dances to music, surrounded by lights and choreographed jets. Artificial islands host Atlantis, Palm, and water and marine animal parks in the resort area.
Antaliya Turkiyaning eng tez rivojlanayo: Antalya is Turkey's fastest-growing city, where visitors from all over the world explore its beautiful beaches and a perfect mix of traditional Turkish culture. Kids love Aqua Land (a water slide lover's dream) and Dolphin Land (home to dolphins, sea lions, and white whales) Beach Park. Explore the old town center and see the Hadrian Gate.
Sharm El Sheikh - Sinay yarim orolidagi: Sharm El Sheikh is a resort town on the Sinai Peninsula, home to some of the best diving sites in the world. The underwater wonders of Ras Mohammed National Park elevate the town to another level. The city attracts advanced and recreational divers from all over the world to explore the Red Sea's underwater life, with wreck diving and reef diving opportunities.
Istanbul Turkiyaning eng gavjum shahri v: Istanbul is Turkey's most populous city and its cultural, economic, and historical center. Located in the northwestern part of Turkey, it divides Europe and Asia through the Bosphorus Strait, connecting the Sea of Marmara and the Black Sea. It's the only city in the world situated on two continents.
